mapper.sql: ${alias}.WINDOW_ID windowId, ${alias}.WINDOW_NAME windowName, ${alias}.REGION_ID regionId, ${alias}.ORG_ID orgId, ${alias}.LINK_PHONE linkPhone, ${alias}.WORK_TIME workTime, ${alias}.WINDOW_ADDRESS windowAddress, ${alias}.TRAFFIC_GUIDE trafficGuide, ${alias}.WINDOW_MEMO windowMemo, ${alias}.MAP_URL mapUrl, ${alias}.MAP_ATT mapAtt, ${alias}.CREATER creater, ${alias}.CREATE_TIME createTime, ${alias}.MODIFIER modifier, ${alias}.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, ${alias}.SORT_NO as sortNo, ${alias}.IS_ACTIVE as isActive, ${alias}.WINDOW_TYPE as windowType, ${alias}.IS_PUBLIC as isPublic, ${alias}.IS_ALL_ITEM as isAllItem, ${alias}.IS_ALL_STAGE as isAllStage, ${alias}.ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId, ${alias}.REGION_RANGE regionRange, ${alias}.STAGE_ITEM_FILTER stageItemFilter, ${alias}.ECHARTS_COLOR echartsColor
mapper.insert: insert into AEA_SERVICE_WINDOW ( WINDOW_ID, WINDOW_NAME, REGION_ID, ORG_ID, LINK_PHONE, WORK_TIME, WINDOW_ADDRESS, TRAFFIC_GUIDE, WINDOW_MEMO, MAP_URL, MAP_ATT, CREATER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, SORT_NO, IS_ACTIVE, WINDOW_TYPE, IS_PUBLIC, IS_ALL_ITEM, IS_ALL_STAGE, ROOT_ORG_ID, REGION_RANGE, STAGE_ITEM_FILTER, ECHARTS_COLOR ) values ( #{windowId}, #{windowName}, #{regionId}, #{orgId}, #{linkPhone}, #{workTime}, #{windowAddress}, #{trafficGuide}, #{windowMemo}, #{mapUrl}, #{mapAtt}, #{creater}, #{createTime}, #{modifier}, #{modifyTime}, #{sortNo}, #{isActive}, #{windowType}, #{isPublic}, #{isAllItem}, #{isAllStage}, #{rootOrgId}, #{regionRange}, #{stageItemFilter}, #{echartsColor} )
mapper.update:
update AEA_SERVICE_WINDOW
WINDOW_ID = #{windowId},
WINDOW_NAME = #{windowName},
REGION_ID = #{regionId},
ORG_ID = #{orgId},
LINK_PHONE = #{linkPhone},
WORK_TIME = #{workTime},
WINDOW_ADDRESS = #{windowAddress},
TRAFFIC_GUIDE = #{trafficGuide},
WINDOW_MEMO = #{windowMemo},
MAP_URL = #{mapUrl},
MAP_ATT = #{mapAtt},
CREATER = #{creater},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
MODIFIER = #{modifier},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime},
SORT_NO = #{sortNo},
IS_ACTIVE = #{isActive},
WINDOW_TYPE = #{windowType},
IS_PUBLIC = #{isPublic},
IS_ALL_ITEM = #{isAllItem},
IS_ALL_STAGE = #{isAllStage},
ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId},
REGION_RANGE = #{regionRange},
STAGE_ITEM_FILTER = #{stageItemFilter},
ECHARTS_COLOR = #{echartsColor},
where WINDOW_ID = #{windowId}
mapper.select:
select
, org.org_name orgName, region.region_name regionName from AEA_SERVICE_WINDOW asw left join opu_om_org org on org.ORG_ID = asw.ORG_ID left join bsc_dic_region region on region.REGION_ID = asw.REGION_ID where asw.WINDOW_ID = #{windowId}
mapper.delete:
delete from AEA_SERVICE_WINDOW where ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId} and WINDOW_ID in
#{windowId}
mapper.select:
select
from AEA_SERVICE_WINDOW asw WHERE asw.WINDOW_ID IN ( SELECT WIND_ID FROM aea_service_window_item WHERE ITEM_VER_ID = #{itemVerId} )
select max(SORT_NO) from AEA_SERVICE_WINDOW where 1 = 1 and ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId}
